answer: Dr. Seuss was an American author and illustrator of children's books. He is known for his whimsical stories, his use of rhyme and meter, and his distinctive illustrations. Some of his most famous works include "The Cat in the Hat," "Green Eggs and Ham," and "The Lorax."
